metadata.title: CVE-2020-9948 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: A type confusion issue was addressed with improved memory handling. This issue is fixed in Safari 14.0. Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to arbitrary code execution.

notes.note: jdstrand> webkit receives limited support. For details, see https://wiki.ubuntu.com/SecurityTeam/FAQ#webkit webkit in Ubuntu uses the JavaScriptCore (JSC) engine, not V8

criterions.comment: qtwebkit-opensource-src package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
webkit2gtk package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.30.1-1').
wpewebkit package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.30.0-1').
